pages.title: Immersive Engineering
pages.text: Adds new Redstone Flux (RF) based machinery with a retro-futuristic feeling to the game, and many of the machines are a multiblock structure. Machines use either low, medium or high voltages&(br)The mod also features Power Generation in forms of wind, biodiesel and more.$(br2)$(l:https://ftb.gamepedia.com/Getting_Started_(Immersive_Engineering))Immersive Engineering Wiki$(/l)

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.text: A Manual was given to you when you joined the server, it has everything you need to know about the mod. if you lose it, consult the recipe above.

pages.title: Addons
pages.text: These are the installed addons for Thaumcraft.
